title: Great composers
brief_description: This renowned BBC series explores the myth behind seven musical composers from the Baroque era to the twentieth century; Bach, Mozart, Beethoven, Wagner, Tchaikovsky, Puccini and Mahler. The programme examines the backgrounds, influences and relationships that make these seven composers part of the fabric of the history of western music. Each composer’s life and work is presented in detail through an amalgam of performance sequences and interviews and comment from contemporary artists and respected authorities.
